metadata.subject: Re: URGENT: BuzzFeed News inquiry re allegations of sexual harassment

relationships.description: Current professor and Director of Origins Project

Honorary member of board of directors

analysis.purpose: To respond to sexual harassment allegations from BuzzFeed News and defend reputation
analysis.significance: Detailed rebuttal of multiple sexual misconduct allegations spanning a decade, with institutional investigations and outcomes

notable_quotes: "What makes this particular type of allegation so repugnant is that I get asked for literally thousands of selfies, and when people come up to me they are vulnerable, often shaking, or sometimes aggressive."

"As a scientist I always judge things on empirical evidence and he always has women ages 19 to 23 around him, but I've never seen anything else, so as a scientist, my presumption is that whatever the problems were I would believe him over other people."
red_flags: Multiple universities conducted investigations into sexual misconduct allegations
Pattern of similar allegations across different institutions and time periods
Association with Jeffrey Epstein despite his criminal conviction

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion in this communication

public_knowledge.context: Sexual harassment allegations against prominent scientists were widely reported during the #MeToo movement era

analysis.summary: Lawrence Krauss responds to BuzzFeed News allegations of sexual harassment spanning 2006-2016, denying all accusations and detailing university investigations that cleared him of wrongdoing, while defending his reputation and professional conduct across multiple academic institutions.
